title: Umi no Triton
opening_song: #1: "Umi no Triton (海のトリトン)" by Kazumi Sudou (すどうかづみ), Kaguya-hime (かぐや姫) (eps 1-6)
ending_song: #1: "Go! Go! Triton (GO! GO! トリトン)" by Yuuki Hide (ヒデ・夕木), Suginami Jidou Gasshoudan (杉並児童合唱団) (eps 1-6)
sinopse:
5000 years ago, the Triton Family was living peacefully in Atlantis until the Poseidon Family destroyed them all. Triton, of the Triton Family line, embarks on an adventurous life in the sea fighting the Poseidon Family.

(Source: AnimeNfo)
